item.description:
Location
•DeRoMi Music Studio
http://www.doremikaraoke.net/

Address
•442 Cambridge Street
Allston, Massachusetts 02134


For that Bollywood princess in you, NetSAP - Boston has organized another Ladies Night..

 

 

Come join the fun at our KARAOKE NIGHT!

DoReMi offers a huge selection of music, including the beloved songs from Bollywood films.

Attendants are encouraged to dress up Indian clothes!

Members: $20 deposit ($15 will be refunded at the event)
Non-members: $20

Signup at: http://www.membership.netip.org/assnfe/ev.asp?ID=185
'Like' us on facebook at www.facebook.com/netsapboston

By T: Take the Green line, line B outbound to Harvard Avenue station. Come 2 blocks toward Cambridge Street, and you will see the venue on the left hand side.

For more questions contact Shilpa@netsapboston.org
item.name: Ladies Night Karaoke!
